required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Compare Efficacy and Safety of CT-P39 and EU-approved Xolair in Patients With Chronic Spontaneous Urticaria
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel Group, Phase 3 Study to Compare Efficacy and Safety of CT-P39 and Xolair in Patients With Chronic Spontaneous Urticaria Who Remain Symptomatic Despite H1 Antihistamine Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: A Double-blind, Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel Group, Phase 3 Study to Compare Efficacy and Safety of CT-P39 and Xolair in Patients with Chronic Spontaneous Urticaria Who Remain Symptomatic despite H1 antihistamine Treatment

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in Weekly Itch Severity Score(ISS7) at Week 12
primary_outcome.description: CT-P39 to EU-approved Xolair at a dose of 300 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the relative potency CT-P39 compared to EU-approved Xolair
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in Weekly Itch Severity Score(ISS7) at Week 12
primary_outcome.description: The relative potency of CT-P39 to the Xolair is defined as the dose of CT-P39 that produces the same biological response as one unit of the dose of the Xolair. The biological response will be estimated by the change from baseline in Weekly Itch Severity Score(ISS7) at Week 12. Since the 2 treatments will be compared at the same 2-dose levels (300 mg and 150 mg), a 4 point assay will be used to calculate the relative potency and its CI.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose response in terms of efficacy [Weekly Itch Severity Score(ISS7)]
secondary_outcome.description: The ISS will be recorded on scale of 0 (none) to 3 (severe) points. The daily ISS is the average of the morning and evening scores and the ISS7 is the sum of the daily ISS over 7 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose response in terms of efficacy [Urticaria Activity Score(UAS)]
secondary_outcome.description: The UAS will be calculated as the sum of the ISS and the HSS. The sum of the scores represents disease severity on a scale from 0 (minimum) to 6 (maximum)

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose response in terms of efficacy [Hives Severity Score(HSS)]
secondary_outcome.description: The HSS, defined by number of hives, will be counted twice daily on a scale of 0 (none) to 3 (intense) points

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose response in terms of efficacy [Angioedema-free days]
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with angioedema-free days

secondary_outcome.time_frame: prior to scheduled study drug administration at Week 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, 20 and 40(End-of-Study, EOS)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life Assessment [Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI)]
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the overall Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI) score. Patients will rate their dermatology symptoms as well as the impact of their skin condition on various aspect of their lives. Each question is scored from 0 (not at all) to 3 (very much). Overall score, on scale of 0 to 30.

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life Assessments [Chronic Urticaria Quality of Life Questionnaire (CU-Q2OL)]
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the overall Chronic Urticaria Quality of Life Questionnaire (CU-Q2OL) score. Patients will rate their CSU symptoms and the impact of their CSU on various aspects of their lives. Each question is scored from 1 (not at all) to 5 (extremely), and overall raw score, on a scale of 23 to 115
The summary of Adverse Events (including Serious Adverse Events)

arm_group.description: 300 mg of CT-P39 as SC injections via PFS
300 mg of EU-approved Xolair as SC injections via PFS
300 mg of CT-P39 as SC injections via PFS
300 mg of EU-approved Xolair as SC injections via PFS
Treatment period 1: 150 mg of CT-P39 Treatment period 2: 300 mg of CT-P39
Treatment period 1: 150 mg of EU-approved Xolair Treatment period 2: 300 mg of EU-approved Xolair

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with CSU
- Diagnosed as CSU refractory to H1-antihistamine
Exclusion Criteria:
- Chronic urticaria with clearly defined underlying etiology
- Clinically significant allergic reaction and/or hypersensitivity to any component of omalizumab
- History of anaphylactic shock
- History of and/or concomitant immune complex disease (including Type III hypersensitivity)
- Parasitic diseases or colonization on stool evaluation for ova and parasites
- Unable to receive background therapy with protocol-defined antihistamines or contraindicated to epinephrine
